sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Container, Row ,Col} from "reactstrap"; // import SymptomChecklist from '../SymptomChecklist/SymptomChecklist' import CurrentNews from "../../../HomePage/currentnews" import ResidentWarning from '../ResidentWarning/ResidentWarning' import VisitHistory from '../VisitHistory/VisitHistory' import Num from '../../../HomePage/def/Cadata.json' import "./ProfileTable.css" class ProfileTable extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { province: this.props.patient.province, history: this.props.patient.visit_history, world_infected: 9843073 } this.evaluate_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl.bind(this) } evaluate_lvl(province, country) { if ((province / country) <= 0.05) { return "low" } else if ((province / country) <= 0.10) { return "medium" } return "high" } render() { const ca_infected = Num.AB + Num.BC + Num.MB + Num.NB + Num.NL + Num.NT + Num.NS + Num.NU + Num.ON + Num.PE + Num.QC + Num.SK + Num.YT let infected_lvl switch (this.state.province) { case "AB": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.AB, ca_infected) break; case "BC": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.BC, ca_infected) break case "MB": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.MB, ca_infected) break case "NB": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.NB, ca_infected) break case "NL": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.NL, ca_infected) break case "NT": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.NT, ca_infected) break case "NS": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.NS, ca_infected) break case "NU": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.NU, ca_infected) break case "ON": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.ON, ca_infected) break case "PE": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.PE, ca_infected) break case "QC": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.QC, ca_infected) break case "SK": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.SK, ca_infected) break case "YT": infected_lvl = this.evaluate_lvl(Num.YT, ca_infected) break default: break; } return(

Canada Situation:
{ca_infected} infected

World Situation:
{this.state.world_infected} infected

{/*
*/}
) } } export default ProfileTable
